name: The Veganing
description:
Play as the last bottle of Solid Bru and fight your way throught the invading healthy army to escape the mansion. Make use of your gun and traps to dispose of the enemies in your way.

A short game made for a college assessment. The theme was on Scotland and thus what better then traditional Scottish foods. 

Developer Note - I no longer have access to GameMaker so sadly there will be no updates for the foreseeable future. However as I still have all of the assets, future work in a different engine is plausable.
